EmailTemplate.name: 06-10-22 BNK Connect Mag V2 Issue 2 NAMER.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: It’s here – latest CONNECT Magazine
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We are delighted to share our June edition of CONNECT Magazine where we discuss the current industry trends. Read about the impact crypto, embedded finance and customer experience can have on financial institutions. Plus, learn about Intel's approach to As a Service and explore how Ethiopia’s Bank of Abyssinia has developed a new branch concept to drive financial inclusion. Click below to go directly to CONNECT. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> To read past issues click here <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/connect-magazine-q2-2022/thank-you?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_June_ConnectMagV2-Issue2_Banking&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
